SELECT a.text as name, a.weekdate , IFNULL(b.total,0) as num FROM ( SELECT date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) + 0 DAY) AS weekdate,'星期一' as text UNION ALL SELECT date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) -1 DAY) AS weekdate,'星期二' as text UNION ALL SELECT date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) - 2 DAY) AS weekdate,'星期三' as text UNION ALL SELECT date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) - 3 DAY) AS weekdate,'星期四' as text UNION ALL SELECT date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) - 4 DAY) AS weekdate,'星期五' as text UNION ALL SELECT date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) - 5 DAY) AS weekdate,'星期六' as text UNION ALL SELECT date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) - 6 DAY) AS weekdate,'星期天' as text ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS datetime, count( id ) AS total FROM t_order_detail WHERE (state='6' or state='4' or state='10') AND create_time < date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) - 6 DAY) AND create_time > date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) + 0 DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) b ON a.weekdate = b.datetime
order by a.weekdate;

select count(0) NUM, '第一周' as name,1 as numorder from t_order_detail t where (state='6' or state='4' or state='10') and create_time between DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day) and DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day) + 7 union select count(0) NUM, '第二周' as name,2 as numorder from t_order_detail t where (state='6' or state='4' or state='10') and create_time between DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day)+7 and DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day) + 14 union select count(0) NUM, '第三周' as name,3 as numorder from t_order_detail t where (state='6' or state='4' or state='10') and create_time between DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day)+14 and DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day) + 21 union select count(0) NUM, '第四周' as name,4 as numorder from t_order_detail t where (state='6' or state='4' or state='10') and create_time between DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day)+21 and DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day) + 28 union select count(0) NUM, '第五周' as name,5 as numorder from t_order_detail t where (state='6' or state='4' or state='10') and create_time between DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day)+28 and last_day(curdate())

SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 5 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS name,count(*) as num from t_order_detail where (state='6' or state='4' or state='10') and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m')= DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 5 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 4 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS name,count(*) as num from t_order_detail where (state='6' or state='4' or state='10') and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m')= DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 4 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 3 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS name,count(*) as num from t_order_detail where (state='6' or state='4' or state='10') and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m')= DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 3 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 2 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS name,count(*) as num from t_order_detail where (state='6' or state='4' or state='10') and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m')= DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 2 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS name,count(*) as num from t_order_detail where (state='6' or state='4' or state='10') and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m')= DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') AS name,count(*) as num from t_order_detail where (state='6' or state='4' or state='10') and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m')
